name: John Cuppi
text: Classic Pizza Hut, good as always here in Ashland!

name: Nathan Byrum
text: This is a wonderful little location.  Just don't expect to dine in, as there are only 2 or 3 booths in a small lobby;  Think less dining room and more waiting area for carry-out orders.  I actually live within a block of this Pizza hut, and use it often.  I've always been well satisfied;  In fact, I think I'm about to go snag a pie now!

name: Sarah Leith
text: Always right good food and deals

name: Andrew Pruett
text: They have always been punctual and professional. We had a bad driver one night and gave us subpar food. They called us immediately and asked if we were ok. After telling them what had happened. They said, no worries, we take care of the â€¦More

name: Jason Pierce
text: It's a small town Pizza Hut in Ashland Missouri that does their Pizza really differently then Pizza Huts I've been to and I actually love it. It tastes like its done differently but it isn't. It's some of the best Pizza I've eaten. Also the Staff are really communicative and open and it's a relaxing atmosphere to be in. It really is..

name: Teri Feiing
text: Good people and good prices.

name: Paul Busch
text: Excellent service from Josh.  Courteous and recommended the good deals available.

name: Anthony Vaughn
text: Pizza hut is delicious as always. They were out of a 20oz for my order once and gave me a 2 liter instead. Good people.

name: Kate Calvin
text: Good pizza, made like I told them

name: Vickie Wright
text: They supreme sandwiches are nothing I they use to be!  They use yucky lettuce & like the tomatoes weren't sliced right. There supreme sandwich used to be 10+ now it's a 0.ðŸ˜ž

name: Sandy Griffin
text: We had great service as always and our pizza selections were delicious! !  Ashland Pizza Hut will continue to be our go to place!

name: Zachary Jones
text: Pizzas good. Delivery takes forever tho. Today it's past an hour and half late and still no food (like many other times). Called and the lady said it's busy and she'll bring it out to us whenever she gets time. That just poor customer service. Shared this on yelp as well.

name: Stephen Carter
text: Pizza was edible. Fine.

name: Amber Tinsley
text: Not your typical Pizza Hut. Seriously. They have dine in, but you order at the counter, have a seat, and they bring your pizza out in a box and either you eat out of the box or on paper towels. Which isn't a big deal but like I said not â€¦More

name: tammy harrison
text: Always have gotten great pizza here and if your order is not to your satisfaction they will make it right

name: Trevor Sapp
text: Very friendly workers and happy to make your visit very wellcome

name: Naomi Katherine
text: Very good customer service

name: Karen Barker
text: Great place! Great food!

name: Steven McMichael
text: Great staff

name: Teresa Hess
text: Great food fast delivery

name: Hubert Oakley
text: Less than average Take out pizza and service

name: Robert Eckleberry
text: Should be called The Hut .50.

name: Donald Fisher
text: Too small

name: LaTerra Silvers
text: Friendly People
